website_summaries.verdict: A highly effective vitamin blend to support fuller, thicker hair encased in a vegan capsule.
pros: A great go-to product for customers struggling with thinning hair
cons: Some users had issues with cystic acne while using this product

customer_reviews.title: I am on my 4th bottle and this stuff is amazing! I just ordered 2 more bottles already
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this hair vitamin is the holy grail! So affordable and my hair is thicker and growing longer so quickly! It does take 2 to 4 weeks to see results, but I'm telling you, I am on my 4th bottle and this stuff is amazing! I just ordered 2 more bottles already! Do yourself a favor and buy it already!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference in one month!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing!! I used to only take biotin and never really saw a difference. This isafyer one month of use and the difference is HUGE! I've started every morning with 2 capsules and that's it! Seriously so happy with this product and definitely will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Bald men want this too...it's amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Balding at 24. As you can see top left is day 1, day 20 is picture 2 and the bottom pictures are the end of one bottle!!! Amazing results for sure!! For any guy who wants to grow their hair out and hesitated like me, or any woman with a bald man in their life this is the secret!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not Today Satan
customer_reviews.text: For the love of all that is Holy, do NOT take this before sleeping, or even 2 or 3 hours before, I have horrible vivid nightmares if I take it at 7 and go to bed at 10, take it in the morning when you wake up. My hair has grown 3/4 and inch tho, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer

customer_reviews.title: Seeing is believing, must try!
customer_reviews.text: These pills are amazing! I was overwhelmed by how quickly I saw a difference. I hesitated writing a review right away because I wanted to get a better idea of how these pills performed over several weeks. I've noticed my hair strands are much stronger, appear to be longer and thicker. Spots where my hair has been balding and thinning are coming back to life. I have very fine, thin hair so the effects were immediately noticeable. I have been taking Biotin supplements for a number of years and have never gotten results like this! I recently repurchased another two bottles and will faithfully continue to use them. Great product! I just hope they never change the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Elise

customer_reviews.title: Skin Breakout
customer_reviews.text: Despite some reviews about skin breakouts I decided to give this product a try. I've been using this product for only 2 days and my skin severely broke out, possible allergic reaction. I've never had skin issues and I drink about a gallon of water a day with a strict diet since I compete in fitness competitions so lack of water and poor diet wasn't the issue. . Just be cautious!
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt help slow down shedding
customer_reviews.text: My hair fell out even more when I use this, I had to go back to expensive hair growth vitamins which does work slowing down my hair shedding. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Viking2014

customer_reviews.title: ITCHYYYYYY!! OUCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: EXTREME ITCHING ALL OVER! I am so disappointed to say that after taking this product for 1 month, I can no longer continue. My body has become intensely itchy all over, including: my arms, legs, back, stomach, hairline and neck. I don't know whats in this that is causing such pain and discomfort, but it is NOT worth it! I develop welts and bumps if i satisfy any itch I have. REALLY UPSET!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Depicciotto

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I took a before and after pic to see the results after one bottle. The before pic is the one the shows a little more hair and I don’t blame the bottle ,it’s my rapid hair loss. Anyways this thing doesn’t work and it was a waste of money I normally don’t buy these things because if their was a cure for male pattern baldness I don’t think a company would keep it a secret. I got suckered by the amazing reviews .
customer_reviews.author: Danny M

customer_reviews.title: This product caused me to break out in an all ...
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me to break out in an all over body rash which required two visits to the dermatologist and it is still not resolved. I have never had skin issues in my life nor do I have sensitive skin. A twenty dollar bottle of bills has cost me hundreds in dermatologist visits.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S

customer_reviews.title: Great for hair growth
customer_reviews.text: Little bit over a month and my hair grew as you can see in the picture! I am very pleased with this product because i felt like my hair would just stop growing at a certain length but when I took these I saw definit growth. I recommend this product👍
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: I love Zhou
customer_reviews.text: Previously I was taking just Biotin supplements and wasn't getting that great of a result for my thinning hair. I started out trying Zhou's Energy + Focus and because that really helped me wake up in the mornings I decided to trial their hair supplement and it has been working well! As seen in the photos are about 6 month difference from when I was just using the Biotin to a month after using the Hairfluence. Hair is thicker, more filled in and I'm more confident. Happy I started using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I've never taken any hair supplements that wouldn't at least make my nails awesome. This product did zero for my hair (ZERO) and I feel like it destroyed my nails. They look brittle, got very soft, and the skin on my hands (on fingers especially) also became very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Olechka

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: From comparing the reviews to my own experience, I'm guessing that these either work wonders or the opposite. For me, my hair has stopped breaking off and falling out. Sparse sections are now filling out as I finish my first bottle and I've gone from losing handful of hair in the shower to literally none unless I pull them out. I'm so happy with these so far. The only other time my hair improved this much was when I was taking massive multivitamins for a twin pregnancy. I've just ordered a second bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: The photo is of one month exactly. (I've skipped a few days here or there on accident) so clearly it's grown a little during the month. Which is great. I've tried other biotin hair vitamins in the past but they've caused acne. I haven't had any negative side effects with this. So far so great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too many stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: Had really high hopes for this to work after reading all the reviews. I resorted to buying them after a bad haircut at a new salon. Unfortunately due to the side effects with my stomach I couldn't tolerate it. Good luck if you're able to tolerate it
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: My hair grows super slow but this is from January to now and ...
customer_reviews.text: It works. My hair grows super slow but this is from January to now and I'm very happy with the results. My hair is so much more softer and stronger. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Just Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed when I saw the combination of biotin, MSM, silica and collagen all in one supplement. ... I didn't bother to read the concentration of these ingredients. The silica and collagen content are WAY too low to make a difference. 400mg of collagen? Most collagen supplements are 6000mg. I should've known better, since the bottle looks so small and most collagen supplements are 6 big ol' horse pills!
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: After using Rogaine faithfully for years with no improvement I decided to try Hairfluence. Like many others I was skeptical. I am post menopausal and thought I might not have any results. To my surprise after six weeks I saw new hair growing on the crown of my head. I am I happy customer and decided to use auto ship from now on. Thanks Hairfluence.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Davison

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of all the wonderful reviews. Unfortunately I kept taking it thinking that if I just finished the bottle it would somehow work. Unfortunately. I kept losing more and more hair. I did not see any hair growth, my hair is a lot thinner now and looks awful. Very disappointed. Unfortunately I waited too long to write this review or ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't feeling this reaction until taking the supplement and since I've no longer taken it I've felt fine.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item because I have thin hair, in taking these vitamins within the first two days not only did I feel extremely hungry but dizziness as well. I wasn't feeling this reaction until taking the supplement and since I've no longer taken it I've felt fine.
customer_reviews.author: linsey

customer_reviews.title: Started in July and now October no difference
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this product religiously since July/August, but now it's October, and I haven't noticed the slightest difference. if you are taking this for thinning hair---it didn't work for me. The pills themselves were fine minus not working. They are easy to swallow and have no smell, but they were not effective for me. I gave it a few months and it didn't work. :( Me and my thin hair will have to go elsewhere....
customer_reviews.author: THISSY

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year = HUGE difference! :) Increasing price. 🙄
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have any problems with this product. What people don’t realize is that too much biotin can make you break out. Rather than looking at the product ahead of time or doing research, they blame the product and give a bad review. Ignorance. Regardless, I have been taking this product for a year and have left a photo of my results. I absolutely love this product and will continue to use it! :) Left: Before. Right: After However, they just keep increasing the price because it works. Eventually, I am going to stop purchasing unless they ease up on their greed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica :)

customer_reviews.title: Not just for ladies!
customer_reviews.text: Hey! My name is Jake. I actually have been taking this for a few months now. I got a horrible haircut on May 8,2020 cause my bday was May 9.. and the guy cut off alll my hair. I just wanted it to be more cleaned up. So the phot on the left is right after he cut it. The picture on the right is two weeks later. Mind you, I have been taking this supplement for awhile so I think it works best once you been taking it continuously. I didn’t just start taking it after my haircut. It works. I highly recommend. I just take the recommended dose, nothing more. And it’s not just for ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob B

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Real results.
customer_reviews.text: I had a month's supply for trial and error. I took my capsules at night. I had a significant growth with in two weeks. By the end of the bottom my hair had grown more thicker and actually gained some length. I'm impressed. I'm the biggest "this crap ain't real" person there is. Will be purchasing my next bottle soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith Red

customer_reviews.title: We both broke out terribly bad immediately
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this because of reviews.... it might work for some but for me and also my sister in law who took it at the same time as me... We both broke out terribly bad immediately. Had to stop taking it the 3rd day. Everyone is different but still... it’s sucks to waste money and also be disappointed in a product you were excited for.
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Really Does Grow Your Hair FAST!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I took this product for 3 1/2 weeks and saw A LOT OF HAIR GROWTH. So it really does grow your hair fast. Cons: It caused me to get so much ACNE it was awful and it made me ITCH really bad. The ACNE was so bad I had to stop taking it. I was drinking a lot of water but that didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Be patient to see results but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Took a while for me to notice a difference but I recommend being patient. After two weeks I started to notice a difference. After 1 month my hair had began to grow like crazy. I have blonde hair so I hardly shave my legs (once a week) now I have to shave 3x a week. My roots have been going so fast as well, I’m considering going back to my stylist sooner than 7 weeks. The more consistent you are using the product, the better results you will see.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Better than Hairfinity!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been taking Hairfluence for a short time and their is a noticeable difference in my hair and my nails. I’ve previously used hairfinity for months at a time and I did not get these same results. My hair is natural so I use a lot of protective styles. In between I’ve noticed that I have less shedding and my hair is thicker and does not break easily. The difference in my nails is even more significant! They’re longer and stronger than they’ve ever been and the best thing of all is that I’ve experienced no acne related to these vitamins my skin is actually clearer as well.
customer_reviews.author: Corinthia Aples

customer_reviews.title: It works!  My hair volume has returned!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 33 year old woman. I started taking Hairfluence four months ago because my hair had thinned significantly on top and I was shedding faster than I could grow new hair. I noticed significant improvement in the thickness of my hair volune after about two months. I also noticed WAY less shedding. Now, four months later, I have gained back my normal hair volume and it no longer looks thin. The directions say to take two pills a day but you really only need to take one. Then a bottle will last you twice as long. I say give this stuff a shot, it worked well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Mugs

customer_reviews.title: Love these vitamins!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these vitamins for three years, without stopping and am amazed with the results!! I had A LOT of hair loss due to anemia, I mean LOTS of loss!!!! I did get my anemia under control, and my hair has never been better. It’s hard for any one person to know if the vista is did it or not, since one person is not a “scientific study”, but for me, I know my hair is thicker, and has less breakage. It takes time, so be patient. I will continue to take these because I want continued results!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista K. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Headaches and pimples
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a headache and made me feel weird. Also got two pimples after 1-2 days on it. Took 3 capsules and will be going in the trash. Silly me for going with the best seller and not reading the 1-star reviews. Oh, and YOU CAN'T RETURN IT.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement! My hair is growing fast and it’s suoer soft and healthy. Will continue to use!
customer_reviews.author: GillianShea

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for 4 weeks and my hair has grown inches and my nails a strong and the longest I have had in years. 10 of my family members are also taking it and have had the same results. Here are my before and after hair and nails
customer_reviews.author: DWillet

customer_reviews.title: Great growth!
customer_reviews.text: I attached 2 photos. The top one is 7/2/17, and the bottom is 9/2/17. After a disastrous haircut, I ordered this in hopes of gaining confidence back and receiving a boost in hair growth and I haven't been disappointed. I don't know that it would have grown so quickly! Of course, high protein diet and exercise/taking care of your body aids in this effort too. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyxandria Hope Scott

customer_reviews.title: My hair started falling out
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this product I saw all the reviews and the overwhelming majority of the people who had used this product praised it for its effectiveness in growing back hair. I bought this product about two weeks ago and have used it daily since then. Today I looked in the mirror and realized that I lost about one-fourth of my hair as a result of using this product I stopped using Hairfluence immediately today. Everybody is different and people respond differently to different supplemental products, I'm writing this not to complain but to let others know they may suffer side effects like losing their hair when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A Sparks

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I am (a...very young!) 61 year old lady.I started losing my hair about 2 years ago.Hair falling out like crazy..in patches.Bald spots!Had thyroid checked..yadayada...I was so...ashamed. Youngins at work(I'm an RN) would watch and take bobby pins to patch me up! I started a hairskinnail supplement from Walgreens...It got Worse!About 4 months ago..I started this supplement. OMG!! I HAVE HAIR! I HAVE NAILS! (I have hair...where I Don't want hair! And..i have to clip my nails!) 5 stars period dot.
customer_reviews.author: OzarksRN

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair fall out!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for four months. Half way through the fourth bottle I have lost 50% of my beautiful curly hair. It was just falling out every single day. After stopping this hairfluence vitamin my hair has finally stopped falling out after 2 1/2 weeks of not taking it. I never in a million years thought that the vitamins I was taking to grow my hair would cause it to fall out and I don’t recommend anyone use this product. I am devastated to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Summer K Moore

customer_reviews.title: did nothing.
customer_reviews.text: didn't seem to do anything at all. update: I was contacted by the manufacturer and given a full refund. This company really does stand by their product and their satisfaction guarantee. If they are this confident that it works, I'll say that other people should give it a try. Just because it didn't seem to do anything for me doesn't mean it wont for you. Zhou seems to really believe that it works, so you should try it for yourself and come up with your own conclusion.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works!!! That is me speaking my truth. I noticed growth about two weeks of me taking the pills.
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I have natural African-American hair and I had a bald spot in my head because I kept rubbing that area because it was tender for some reason. I use this and also black castor oil and I have seen a change in my overall hair I feel as though it's thicker and healthier and stronger. I see less shedding when washing and my hair is growing really fast I will continue to buy this
customer_reviews.author: Emma Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Best product hands down
customer_reviews.text: It has been a Miracle for me! I’ve tried so many things and nothing ever touched my ‘after baby’ hair loss.. then this has been a game changer! I am on month 4 and never stopping. This product is the best! ♥️
customer_reviews.author: J. Allred

customer_reviews.title: Volcanic Eruption on My Chin
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed amazing and I started to notice differences in my hair (whether this was in my mind or not is up to you) but it wasn’t worth the disastrous cystic acne that developed on my chin. I’ve had hormonal acne in the past, but nothing’s compared to the volcanic eruption this pill caused on my face. I do NOT recommend this product due to the horrific side effects.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: I believe Zhou Nutrition is helping my hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair is healthy and bold and beautiful. I have been getting several compliments! I HAVE also been using hair products that do not contain parabens, alcohol, glycerin, or other harmful ingredients. All natural is the way to go and I certainly feel that Zhou Nutrition stands by that.
customer_reviews.author: Naz

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting up in age and my hair has been thinning.i get so much hair lost in my brush.i've been taking harfluance for only about 5 months now.the bottle says take two a day,im on a budget and thats pricey for me.i take just one a day andi have new growth! I can't believe it! and even better,my hair's not falling out in my brush anymore! This stuff really works for me.i highly recommend it,and hope it works for you too.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: So excited!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited with the difference in the thickness of my hair after just one bottle of Hairfluence!! My hair is much thicker and healthy and my nails are so strong! My skin is glowy!! I'm on my second bottle and honestly don't plan on stopping! I'm growing my hair out because I've wanted it long for years now and it's finally going to happen!! Love this vitamin!
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me
customer_reviews.text: I took these as directed but saw absolutely no change in either my hair or my nails. Too expensive to keep going on the off chance they,ll have some effect in two or four months. To my surprise, the company refunded my money without my even asking. That kind of customer service is worth a lot to me. I will be checking out the other offerings from this company later..
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kapell

customer_reviews.title: Flaunt your hair.  Give the others hair envy
customer_reviews.text: I love HAIRFLUENCE. My hair was falling and thinning out due to my hypothyroidism. After 3 weeks of using HAIRFLUENCE daily, my thin spots filled in and my hair stopped shedding. I've tried other well known brands of hair growth pills and nothing works like HAIRFLUENCE. I'm so glad I purchased 2 bottles and I will purchase again. When I'm done my second bottle I'll do a length check and post photos.
customer_reviews.author: glam girl

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you have thyroid problems
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for quite a while. I took them for ten months. Made my hair grow fast at first, then recently I noticed my hair falling out (counted about 50 ) when showering and my nails were breaking. I take med for hypothyroidism and the Hairfluence was affecting my body. Stopped and within a few weeks hair no longer falls out, nails are growing.
customer_reviews.author: DesertGal

customer_reviews.title: Works on thyroid-problem hair issues
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different biotin supplements over the years because I naturally have thin, fine hair. As a teen I started getting hypothyroidism causing me to lose hair and the hair I had was fragile. I intentionally waited until after I'd been taking Hairfluence before writing my review. This stuff is fantastic! Within the first month I noticed a huge number of new hairs growing in. At the two month mark, I started noticing my hair is making a thicker ponytail than it used to. I look forward to the changes that I'm sure will come over the next few months. Definitely a subscription worthy product. Thanks for another excellent supplement, Zhou!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pills in February and only took one a day since I am prone to breakouts with Biotin. I was keeping track of my hair length every week through March and part of April, but honestly got side tracked due to the pandemic. I finally did a length check mid-May and was extremely surprised at how much my hair had actually grown. My hair usually grows pretty fast but the length retention has been an issue. On the pills I saw less shedding and my hair even seems thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: It is good, be patient, give yourself some time.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months taking this supplement, I can say I am seeing a difference in my hair growth. Specially around the sides of my faces...new hair is coming out. I will definitely keep taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I've had a thick head of hair my whole life it was one thing I didn't worry about as I aged and then about 2 years ago I looked in the mirror and could see my scalp, I was horrified. It got worse and my hair also became very coarse I decided to try this about 3 months ago and was disappointed at first but now my hair is softer, thicker, shiny again and grows faster. Also maybe it's just my imagination but I think I have some new growth. My wife started taking them about 3 weeks ago and her hair already looks better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caution please
customer_reviews.text: I started to break out soon after taking these pills. I couldn't figure out why if I had not changed anything in my diet or lifestyle other than these pills. I wanted to like these very much but unfortunately they didn't work for me. I decided to stop taking them before finishing the bottle so I can't say I saw a difference in my hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Hdz

customer_reviews.title: Extremes hair loss!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product! The reviews were fantastic! I have been taking it for two months now, & the ONLY thing I notice is my hair is falling out!!!!! My hair hasn't grown at all, & it's definitely not thicker or fuller! Every time I shower & wash my hair there is so much hair all over the shower & this has never happened to me before! I have spent over $40 on these & I am beyond disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Ferriola

customer_reviews.title: Growth
customer_reviews.text: Photo is from May 2020 (right photo) to today October 2,20202 it’s slowly growing back. I take 2 daily. After getting out the shower and my hair dries there is a lot of hairs poking out because there’s a lot of new growth I know it will take time to get long and thick in my hair but there is definitely a lot of growth starting. I lost a lot of hair since I started school and decided to try this I’m on a subscription to get one bottle every two weeks because my husband now takes it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if it’s the supplements or the other hair products I’m using to grow my hair out but I’m not joking, my hair has grown 2 inches in the last month, maybe more. I also do head massages with castor oil every day and my hair has become much fuller, healthier and longer!
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: not necessarily longer but definitely fuller
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 2 months (1 pill/day instead of 2 pills.) I didn't see much growth in my length (you can see in the pics that my hair maybe only grew 1/2 inch.) BUT it totally got thicker and fuller and I had to trim my bangs twice where I usually only trim them maybe once every 3 months. So it definitely works, I just would've liked to see more actual length grown. I think I'm gonna buy another bottle and take the actual recommended dosage. I'll update after I do that,
customer_reviews.author: spikeschilde

customer_reviews.title: Side effects :(
customer_reviews.text: Reviews had talked about the bumps on the skin. I got those :(. Good news is they resolve once you discontinue the product. Since I bought the product I’m not sure how legit it is. I must admit reading some of the reviews scared me. My best advice would be if you are going to try it, do like me and start with only 1 tab a day to see how you react.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they don't break as easily and since I use gel nails
customer_reviews.text: I have waited for almost a year to write this review. Started taking this product in May of 2016 and subscribed to get it monthly, so I take 2 pills a day every day. I have seen some improvements in my nails, they don't break as easily and since I use gel nails, I can keep using it without destroying my nails. I have NOT seen any difference in my hair growth. I'll give it few more months and then will stop buying it in search of something better.
customer_reviews.author: YanaR

customer_reviews.title: Thyroid problems
customer_reviews.text: So at first I was going to leave a bad review because for the first 3 days after taking these at night I was awake the whole entire night and that is not normal for me. But after taking them in the afternoon I am back to sleeping fine. My hair is shinier and healthier just after a couple days. I have thyroid problems which makes my hair fall out and this seems to help so far. Just don't take it with your medicine of course. Am excited to see results after taking the whole bottle. Also I only take one a day instead of 2 and it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Monica W.

customer_reviews.title: It Really Makes A Difference!
customer_reviews.text: It took a few weeks to take effect, but I have noticed that my hair loss has slowed down considerably. I intend on purchasing a second bottle to see if it improves further. As someone who takes a regiment of herbs and vitamins, I realize that some things take time to get into your system and be given a chance to work. If more people realized this and were more patient, we would have less people reaching for a prescription "pill" to cure all. This is the first product for hair loss that I have purchased that has actually made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Hughes

customer_reviews.title: I don't usually recommend supplements, but i would recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I am genuinely impressed by this product. I was admittedly pretty skeptical (as I am with most supplements). I figured that since it was on a lightning deal and had largely positive reviews it wouldnt hurt to give it a shot. Currently at a month in it seems to be working! My hair seems and feels thicker than it did a month ago. My one concern, from reading the reviews, was the possibility of increased acne. While I have noticed a small increase I've been able to keep it largely in control just by washing my face once a day. I was so impressed by the first month that i bought another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Isoroku

customer_reviews.title: I'm a real, unpaid customer. This stuff WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: I have an immune system disease that has caused my hair to thin and fall out in clumps. I have tried multiple brands of prenatal vitamins, hair and nail vitamins, and biotin supplements, and received just ok results. I have been taking Hairfluence for 5 or 6 months now. My hair growth has been unbelievable. It has stopped falling out. It's long and thick once again. It's been YEARS since my hair looked or felt this good. My family members have all noticed how much better my hair looks. I've never received free product, I haven't been paid or compensated in any way for this review. ...I wish I had! Bottom line, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the results of Hairfluence!
customer_reviews.text: Best hair vitamins I have used- and now the only hair vitamins for me. About a year after chemo my hair started falling out- very scary for me after having lost all my hair from chemo treatments. There was no progress until I started taking Hairfluence.(And I had paid as much as $50 for hair vitamins.) I saw some slowing on the first bottle, by the second bottle, I am losing VERY little and don't even need to clean the drain after showering!! My hair is still thin- I have some regrowth and time will tell how much. Too- my hair has grown about an inch in 6 weeks. VERY happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: BEST Solution ever for hair loss
customer_reviews.text: Amazing hair supplements. I am studying abroad in a second world country and the sun and my diet caused so much damage to my hair despite my extensive care. My hair was shedding and in every corner in the room which made me super depressed and anxious. I tried to wash my hair with so many other oils and tried so many methods and my hair didn't stop shedding until I tried Hairfluence. WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN ALL MY LIFE? One week after taking these supplements, my hair is not shedding and is shiny and strong. I can feel it when I pass my fingers through it and brush it. Thank you Zhou Nutrition for such an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: QueenA

customer_reviews.title: Count your capsules
customer_reviews.text: I think this product works.. I will rate it after 3 months again! I was disappointed because I purchased 2 bottles both bottles did not have the 60 capsules as stated in the bottle. One of the bottles was short 5 capsules. When I first opened the first bottle I noted the date on the bottle. Since you take 2 a day I should have had for 30 days. When I opened the 2nd bottle to take 2 capsules 1 capsule was empty. Then I decided to count all of them. I was short 3 capsules and 3 capsules were empty. I ordered another bottle and the lessoned learned I will count them before I start taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Lruboch

customer_reviews.title: My hair is finally growing!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to rant and rave over products. However, I've been struggling with trying to grow my hair out for awhile now. I have very fine, thin hair. I cut it short a few years ago and have had a hard time growing it out past my shoulders without it breaking off. A friend of mine did some research and came across Hairfluence. I decided to give it a try and after a month of using this product, my hair is finally growing! Check out my photo-- that's only after a month! 10/10 would definitely recommend. Can't wait to see how long my hair is after a few months of using Hairfluence.
customer_reviews.author: Charleigh Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Real results
customer_reviews.text: My hair has noticeably improved since I began using this product 3 months ago. Before using it I was losing substantial amounts of hair daily and my hair was dry no matter how much I moisturized it. I began noticing less hair loss after about 2 weeks and then even less after a month. Around the second month my hair became shinier, longer and thicker. When I went for a cut my hairdresser said my hair was in best condition she'd ever seen it in the 6 years I'd been going to her. The results I've seen prove to me that science and quality ingredients were truly used to create this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: My hair finally looks healthy again!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 30 days now and I absolutely love it! Due to a copper iud, my hair had lost its sheen, thickness and health. The left side of my hair stopped growing and started breaking off significantly. I decided to give hairfluence a shot as a last ditch effort to save my poor hair. After the first week my boyfriend noticed that the shine was back in my hair. I took photos to document and I noticed the left side of my hair was finally starting to grow and even out with the right. I am planning on continuing to use this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Will never stop taking again!
customer_reviews.text: I had terrible fallout once again, stress, antidepressants, aging, I'm not sure why but started taking these again about six months ago. Now I have minimum hair shedding, LOTS of new growth and about two inches in length.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Decreased my hair loss
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have really long hair that started falling out in handfuls. I have used this product for a month and while I have not seen new hair growth, my hair has not been falling out as much. I decided to try this product for a 2nd month to see if it really helps. For me there is no nasty after taste even if I take it on an empty stomach which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Really Really works
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking these supplements for almost three months. I noticed my hair stopped falling off almost immediately. I was loosing so much hair that I was getting desperate. I was causing my drain to clog and my hair was brittle and lackluster. It was falling off in clumps all by itself. Words can’t describe my joy when I shampoo my hair now and only a few hairs are on my drain. My hair feels bouncier, soft and shiny. I wish I knew about this product sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Try!
customer_reviews.text: These are good. It made my hair thicker and longer. I’ve gotten 3 bottles which I have used on and off and even then I noticed an improvement. They will not work overnight but they are a great help when used with good hair masks and conditioner. Their only drawback is the weird after taste. Take them with a meal. I did not notice any major hair growth in any other place other than my head. Price is a little steep so I might try to find something else but I totally see me using it in the future again.
customer_reviews.author: are318

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! I have been using it for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have been using it for a couple of months and have received sooo many compliments already on how much healthier my hair looks. It feels fuller, looks shinier and just overall healthier. My hair has grown, and while I'm not sure if it's at an accelerated rate as I didnt measure but I was never able to put my hair in a ponytail after cutting it and now I am! So I think that's a good indication. Another thing that's great is this did not irritate my skin as had happened to me previously using Biotin which caused cystic acne. With this my skin is as usual. Love hairfluence!!!
customer_reviews.author: BasmatiBurner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered about 6 bottles of this within last 2 years. Dealing with weak hair, I always have to take Hair vitamin on top of my daily multi vitamins. I do not like to lock in one product so I juggle between different brands but my friend and I both noticed less falling hair when we are using this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t a believer m, but now I am. I took these religiously after a bout with hypothyroidism, and had gorgeous healthy hair. Well dummy me just thought my body had rebounded naturally and I stopped taking these. About 3 months later I had a TON of fallout! I’ve been to the doctor numerous times, had bloodwork and only when I was shopping on amazon and clicked on the page did I realize this was what had changed. I ordered immediately and will be using for life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Negative Results
customer_reviews.text: Not much of a review here. I ordered a bottle, took them as directed and nada, zilch, zero. Did not change my hiar loss one iota. My gynecologist told me to try minoxidi (brand name Rogaine), so I did. took a while for it to show results, but alas, new hair growth. He told that it works much better on women than on men. PS - I buy the Wal*Mart equate brand, much cheaper than 'Rogaine' and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Maine-iac

customer_reviews.title: I ended up with a really bad haircut and ended up having to have it all ...
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with a really bad haircut and ended up having to have it all chopped off in order to fix it. I am using this product in conjunction with Ovation cell therapy in the hope that it will grow back faster and have seen 3/4 of an inch worth of growth in approximately one month. My hair normally grows very slow so I believe the product to be working well. I will say that you definitely need to drink at least the minimum recommended amount of 8-8oz glasses of water per day. I'm waiting on bottle number two to come in the mail today. I will continue to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M Rieken

customer_reviews.title: Sadly did NOT help my fine, thin hair growth
customer_reviews.text: This review is sad to post because I did a lot of research on hair growth vitamins before subscribing to receive Hairfluence. It is simple to take and the taste is tolerable. I did not experience any side effects. Unfortunately though, after 6 months of daily supplementation, I have ABSOLUTELY NO increase in hair growth, thickness, or improvement in texture. This was a large investment that I cannot get back. I have thin, fine, semi straight dark blonde hair. I have kept everything else - diet, water intake, medication, etc the same. I wish Hairfluence worked for me, but unfortunately I just cancelled my monthly Amazon subscription. Hope it works for others.
customer_reviews.author: Katie R

customer_reviews.title: Best For Strong Hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product with not only your vitamins but your essential hair regrowth tools - biotin, bamboo, msm, etc. You will definitely start noticing not only your hair getting stronger and longer within a month but you will also notice your skin and nails become more sturdier and better looking. The real thickness of my hair started around the two month mark and it really did fill in parts of my hear that were nearly bald.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: After that I’ll write and more in-depth review but I’d recommend them. Only thing negative about them is that ...
customer_reviews.text: So I had my hair highlighted late August and typically my hair grows slow so I added these vitamins to my diet in October and I have significantly more roots showing now in late November than I would without the vitamins. I’m a total skeptic pessimist but this stuff I think actually works. I think I’m going to try a different brand and then compare the two. After that I’ll write and more in-depth review but I’d recommend them. Only thing negative about them is that when you first swallow them they have they real strong vitamin taste but it goes away after another sip or two of drink.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs50Kal

customer_reviews.title: Saved my hair!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for the past 3 years and this is my first time writing a review. I started experiencing hair loss due to thyroid dysfunction. I was losing chunks and chunks of hair and was scared and stressed. My BF did some reach and bought them for me, within 3 days my hair completely stopped falling out and felt stronger. There hair vitamins are my tried and true. Not only Are they effective but you can’t beat the price. I recommend this product to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer m.

customer_reviews.title: Don't care for the smell, had a breakout, but...
customer_reviews.text: Before these, I was taking Nutrafol. I did see some improvement with that one, but at $88, I just cannot afford to keep taking them. Trying these instead. Not so sure about them yet. They smell and taste bad. I guess a lot of vitamins do, though. Also, I started breaking out after taking them and I never really have breakouts anymore at my age... but, my hair is looking pretty good. I will try to be patient and see if the breakout is just temporary. I guess it's worth a try if it will improve my hair. I'll keep you updated.
customer_reviews.author: ThatPainterChick

customer_reviews.title: Experienced no difference in hair growth and had more hair loss
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I am unable to rate this product higher than 1 star. I took it according to the directions for two months and have seen no difference in the growth of my hair. I also seem to lose a lot more hair when showering and brushing than I did before taking this product. I cannot recommend this nor will I be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Célestine

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for hair growth. It definitely works, my hair got thicker with a 1 month supply. What I didn’t like was the constant breakout on my face , closeTo my chin and mouth and I have very clear skin and never any breakouts. Wish I knew what ingredient caused the breakout, other than that product definitely worked for me. I’m 54 years of age and my hair seems to grow very slowly now. This helped but I’ll have to find something else that agrees with me, with no side affects.
customer_reviews.author: Lady KB

customer_reviews.title: It does what it claims
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something that'll make your hair grow, this is it. I used it for four weeks and took a picture every week. I've attached them with the review. (Disregard the fact that I should have trimmed my hair before I started taking these...) Compared to other products, which I haven't tried, these do kinda seem spendy. But they work. My hair grew about two inches or so by the end of the bottle. I also had to trim my nails every week because they grew so fast. I didn't notice any side effects aside from the massive amount of shedding that happened. All in all, good product. I would recommend it to anyone wanting hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work for me. I prefer Viviscal.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it. I felt like it was overworking my liver, Because I noticed A difference in my urine, something that doesn’t happen when I take Viviscal. Also when I started taking Viviscal, in the first week the difference in my hair thickness was visible, on the other hand, while I was taking hairfluence I didn’t notice any difference. Maybe you guys need to give it more time, but again, the fact that I felt it wasn’t doing well to my liver I stopped it.
customer_reviews.author: Kely

customer_reviews.title: Black hair grows!
customer_reviews.text: I had a BAD haircut in March and I took these along with a healthy hair care regimen and grew it back in a few months. I love these vitamins but it’s important to remember you HAVE to take care of your hair while using these
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: MADE MY HAIR STRONGER, NOT LONGER
customer_reviews.text: Bought and used only 1 bottle. Didn't see any hair growth (length-wise) but saw a NOTICEABLE reduction in breakage when detangling my wet hair. I removed ALOT less hair from my brush than I would normally ( I honestly want to say about 40 to 50% less) which probably came from the product making my hair stronger. I will definitely re-purchase later on and use in conjunction with a HAIR GROWTH product.
customer_reviews.author: NAOMI MONTEIRO

customer_reviews.title: Was not that great
customer_reviews.text: I took this product for the 30 days and did not notice any difference. I started reading reviews from other customers and it was 50/50. But one man did give some good information about if you're taking too much of certain vitamins it can cause other issues. I believe he stated something about too much Vitamin A can sometimes cause pimple outbreaks. Those were not his exact words, but I realized that I was taking this product and a multivitamin at the same time and may have been getting too much Vitamin A, which was causing some pimple outbreaks for myself. So I might try this again without taking a multivitamin and see if it makes any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Davis

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: I had to give it 1 star because I started taking them a few weeks ago. Pros I see so far, my hair seems shiny and healthy. BUT I was reading other reviews a out the vitamin dosages and how it exceeds the daily recommended value and how it. could cause liver issues. Also every time I take this, my urine is BRIGHT NEON YELLOW. very odd. Idk I think I will stop taking them. Not worth the unknown imo. Also my skin broke out bad!!!!! Like painful deep multiple pimples on chin and neck! Never happens before!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: No improvement in any way and really wanted to believe in this product. Bought 2 bottles and went through both with no change in hair growth. Bought 2 bottles total.. at different times a month apart. And the second bottle's pills were completely different color. Clear capsules allowed me to notice one bottle powder was tan and the next bottles powder a bright yellow. Inconsistent ingredients inconsistent results. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Please help

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING product!!!!! 😍
customer_reviews.text: This product has been AMAZING for my hair! 👌 My hair was pretty dead, thin, falling out, and just wasn't looking good at all. After using this product for only two weeks I have noticed a HUGE difference in my hair! It feels so much thicker and healthier and it has grown more than it has in a long time! My hair stopped growing and it would just break off, but this product has totally transformed my hair!!! I am 100% satisfied and I will continue to buy and recommend!!!! Everyone's hair is different, but I would definitely give this a try!!!! I'm so excited about my results!!!!!! 😍😊😍😊
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: good for fingernails
customer_reviews.text: I tried these pills for 3 months before writing this review. I definitely noticed stronger and faster growing fingernails and hair on my legs, but no improvement in hair on my head. I took them in the morning because I would wake up in the middle of the night with a stomach ache if I took them at night. Also, I did not have any skin problems as I only took one pill per day for 1st 10 days as recommended by reviews. Now I will switch to DHT blocker instead.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hair grew approx 2 inches in one month. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, you may be a little itchy lol
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve taken the vitamins about a month. They definitely make me a little itchy. At first, I wasn’t sure, then I read a few other reviews and realized it was the vitamins for sure. Thing is, my hair seems to be strong, soft and shiny. I’m also using a serum on my scalp that is super helpful is keeping the hair moist and soft. I’ll take it one more month to see if the growth ramps up.
customer_reviews.author: Summur

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy I picked hairfluence
customer_reviews.text: About 2 1/2 months after my daughter was born I began to lose my hair. I’m talking about chunks in the shower, handfuls when I brushed and throughout the day. I was devestated, so I logged on to amazon to read reviews of different products and set my hopes on haifluence. I am so thankful I did, after the first month my temples had new baby hairs and filling in. Now I’m in my second bottle and my hair feels thicker, stronger, and my bald spots are not noticeable. I’m very happy I picked hairfluence!!
customer_reviews.author: Danny C

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff since the little blue pill ;)
customer_reviews.text: This product had my hair growing off my head like a pot planted in the right soil. I went from buzzed cut to over 5” of hair in just under 5 months. With that said, I did pair this with A good diet, exercise and some great hair oil.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Zhou, but Hairfluence didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I unfortunately was one of the people with a very negative reaction to this supplement. Within 3 days I started seeing the beginning of a terrible breakout on my forehead and was dealing with AWFUL headaches, enough to wake me in the night and keep me from sleeping. I've not made any other changes in supplements or my diet and judging by other reviews this can be a reaction to this product :( On the upside, the company went above and beyond to correct the issue. I am very impressed with their customer service and I think that says a lot for their products. I would absolutely recommend giving this a try for yourself before you decide!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: HAIRFLUENCE - Hair Growth Formula For Longer, Stronger, Healthier Hair - Scientifically Formulated with Biotin, Keratin, Bamboo & More! - For All Hair Types - Veggie Capsules
product_meta.description:
Hairfluence is your new secret weapon for longer, stronger hair. Scientifically formulated to supplement possible nutrient deficiencies in your diet, Hairfluence combines the power of biotin with 10 essential vitamins, minerals, and amino acids. Our premium complex works to support healthier, luscious locks (even skin and nails!) from the inside out. Consistently take the once-daily serving to see results in your skin and nails by weeks 2-3 and in your hair by weeks 3-4. 

Vitamins & Minerals: Vitamin A, Vitamin B1, B2, B6, B12, Biotin, Vitamin C, Vitamin D3, Niacin, Folate, Pantothenic Acid & Calcium 

Protein Building Blocks: MSM, Collagen Hydrolysate, Bamboo Extract & Hydrolyzed Keratin
feature_bullets: HEALTHY, FAST-GROWING HAIR. Want healthier, fuller, faster-growing hair? We’ve made it attainable with Hairfluence, our once-daily supplement that supports healthy hair from the inside out. Simply be consistent and let the magic unfold.

THE ROOT ISSUE: NUTRIENT DEFICIENCIES. It’s difficult to consume all the nutrients you need from food alone. Hairfluence helps supplement the nutrients that may be missing from your diet with a powerful complex including B vitamins, biotin, and collagen.

GLOWING SKIN & HEALTHY NAILS. While it may take 3-4 weeks of consistent use for significant, visible changes in your hair, the benefits to your skin and nails will be much faster and should begin to appear after 2-3 weeks of consistent use.

SCIENTIFIC FORMULATION. It's no secret that biotin can do wonders for your hair, but other ingredients can boost its effectiveness. Our blend combines several essential vitamins, minerals, and amino acids that work in harmony to deliver maximum results.

WHAT SETS US APART? At Zhou, we use only the highest-quality ingredients in an FDA certified facility following GMP (good manufacturing practices). Plus, we test everything at our lab in Utah, so you can be confident that you’re fueling your body with the very best.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
